Title: Prohibits the siting and construction of battery energy storage systems and related facilities, systems, infrastructure, and substations of any scale and possessing any storage capacity in assembly district 64
Summary: Prohibits the siting and construction of battery energy storage systems and related facilities, systems, infrastructure, and substations of any scale and possessing any storage capacity in assembly district 64; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง137, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend to the general municipal law, in relation to prohibiting the siting of battery energy storage system sites in assembly district 64 as established by chapter 127 of the laws of 2023; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
